description: Chuuta Kokonose is an orphan who lives with his aunt. For as long as he can remember he's had a voice in his head, but other than that he's a normal boy - right until the day when a strangely-looking thing follows him home and teleports him to a place filled with more fantastic creatures. It's a space police station, and Rein Brickke, the Chief of Solar System Department, tells him that he's been chosen by the computer as a possible candidate to join the police force, although Misuzu Sonokata, a girl from Chuuta's school with an angelic face and ill temper who turns out to be one of Rein Brickke's subordinates, doesn't think him suitable for such a job. Chuuta, who was shocked at first, decides to take aptitude test after being urged by the voice in his head and to prove Misuzu wrong.

tags.name: Space

node.description:
__Debut__: 1998

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/amano_akira_)

Akira Amano is the author and mangaka of the shonen manga Katekyo Hitman Reborn! They were born in 1973, but the month and day are unknown.  Amano began in 1998 with a job at Weekly Young Magazine. They also held a job at Shueisha Publishing Co, Ltd.  In 2002, Amano participated in a contest for aspiring mangaka and was one of the lucky winners, with their comic Monkey Business published in Young Magazine.  In 2004, they finally found success with the humorous and classy manga Katekyo Hitman Reborn! (or, for short, just Reborn!), and that thanks to their readers' support. This new manga was advertised more and more in Shonen Jump and became a hit. Two years later, their manga was made into an anime series by Artland studios. 

Their ideas for Reborn!: Amano had some crazy ideas to entertain readers with. They came up with weird characters to add spice to the humor, a story written especially to be unique, and fast-paced action.    

Other works:  Boy Spin (1998)  Hot Blast Baseball Legendary (1999)  Pu Chipu Chirabii (2000)  Monkey Business (2002)  Tapir Hearts HAWK! (2003)  Katekyo Hitman Reborn! (2004)    Colleagues:  Ken Osamu Sakaki  KAITO  Main pine of indigo  Kobayashi  Kasuga truth

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/936428941) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/sekibeing/) | [Weibo](https://weibo.com/u/1948805307)

Huang is a Chinese web animator who started in Candybox studio, then moved to Studio Pierrot & now currently found his own studio “GEAR studio”.

Alfakyun. (あるふぁきゅん。) is a utaite who started in June 2013. Despite this, her most popular cover, "Guren no Yumiya" has already gained 3.1 million views as of July 2016, doing so in only a few months.

She can switch between both low and high voices with ease, which especially can be seen on her covers of "E? Aa, Sou." and "How-to Sekai Seifuku" and notably in her newest album rootage/α. that was released on 2018/08/15.

Her low voice is known to be unusually very powerful for a woman, while her high voice is very feminine and cute such as demonstrated in her cover of "Chototsu Moushin Girl" and notably in her newest album rootage/α. that was released on 2018/08/15

Japanese: あるふぁきゅん。 (arufuakyun.)
Also known as: +α/Alfakyun.＋α/Alphakyun.
